oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Calendar of the Coptic Orthodox Easter
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Calendar of the Coptic Orthodox Easter date which was set by Demetrius I, Bishop of Alexandria and the Ecumenical Council of Nicaea.
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Council of Nicaea (1st : 325). Creed
Coptic church; Easter
oai_dc:dc.dc:relation: Iryan Moftah Coptic Language and Religion Manuscripts
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: Iryan Moftah Collection of Manuscripts; Iryan Moftah Coptic Language and Religion Manuscript and Book Collection; Rare Books and Special Collections Library; American University in Cairo

oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The Iryan Moftah Coptic Language and Religion Manuscript and Book Collection was acquired in 2003 thanks to Laurence Moftah who generously arranged for its transfer to the Rare Books and Special Collection Library in support of the preservation of Coptic heritage and the Coptic studies program at the American University in Cairo. The manuscripts were originally digitized and described by Father Maximous El-Antony with the aid of the Rare Books and Special Collections Library in 2010.
